solution_line_template: That means each child get {total_houses_visited}*{treats_per_kid_per_house}=<<{total_houses_visited}*{treats_per_kid_per_house}={treats_per_child}>>{treats_per_child} treats
So in total they get {treats_per_child}*{num_children}=<<{treats_per_child}*{num_children}={total_treats}>>{total_treats} treats
